predicate.note: Frames file for 'intervene' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: with adverbials
example.text: [*-1] Testifying before a House subcommittee , Mr. Mulford said that if the Treasury had n't intervened in foreign-exchange markets in September and early October [*-2] to reduce the dollar 's value , the plunge in the stock market might have provoked a steep fall in the currency that [*T*-97] might have `` unhinged financial markets . ''
